title: What are some natural products that help boost the immune system?
description: Answer (1 of 98): Factors like unwholesome food and sedentary diet & lifestyle contribute to low immunity. Of course, each individual is unique, and according to Ayurveda, strong immunity is a product of good digestion, strong metabolic fire, good liver function, and a balanced endocrine system. ...
